about_the_game:
Ronald's Run takes place in Ronald's fantasy world. He receives magic from a wise old sage and must use this magic to stop Nanoos. Includes three mapped levels

Ronald's Village

Here Ronald receives his powerful magic and after defeating the Nanoos gathering coins and is then ready to jump through a portal to level 2.

Old Dungeon

Navigate Ronald to survive the dungeon. This level not only has Nanoos but actual treasure chests to increase your coin count. Collect as many gold coins as possible before you jump to level 3.

Magnificent Temple

This majestic temple houses the big Boss Nanoo. Collect as many gold coins that you can and defeat the Boss to travel back home to your village.

Help Ronald use his magic to defeat the crazy Nanoos. There are 3 levels to choose from and you can collect as many coins as possible. A fun single-player as Ronald gains experience with every Nanoo vanquished.
detailed_description:
Ronald's Run takes place in Ronald's fantasy world. He receives magic from a wise old sage and must use this magic to stop Nanoos. Includes three mapped levels

Ronald's Village

Here Ronald receives his powerful magic and after defeating the Nanoos gathering coins and is then ready to jump through a portal to level 2.

Old Dungeon

Navigate Ronald to survive the dungeon. This level not only has Nanoos but actual treasure chests to increase your coin count. Collect as many gold coins as possible before you jump to level 3.

Magnificent Temple

This majestic temple houses the big Boss Nanoo. Collect as many gold coins that you can and defeat the Boss to travel back home to your village.

Help Ronald use his magic to defeat the crazy Nanoos. There are 3 levels to choose from and you can collect as many coins as possible. A fun single-player as Ronald gains experience with every Nanoo vanquished.
name: Ronald's Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or Equivalent
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960 Or Equivalent

short_description: Help Ronald use his magic to defeat the crazy nanoos. There are 3 levels to choose from and you can collect as many coins as possible. A fun single-player as Ronald gains experience with every nanoo vanquished.
